comments:
Step to reproduce:
1. Open chart builder and click "Data bindings" in "Select Data" tab
2. Click Add or Edit.

Expected result:
Dialog pops up.

Actual result:
No dialog pops up and NPE is thrown in error log.

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.DataColumnBindingDialog.setInput(DataColumnBindingDialog.java:92)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.DataColumnBindingDialog.setInput(DataColumnBindingDialog.java:45)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.dialogs.ColumnBindingDialog.handleAddEvent(ColumnBindingDialog.java:902)

Chart need it's own dialog.
Designer can help to make the dialog reusable, but we don't approve the dialog will fit to extended item.

Caused by duplicate id of designer's extension in reportitem ui plugin.
Fixed it by renaming it.
